features.featureTitle: Add the uploaded image file "B9880E96-BF00-4325-A5A7-C90172ACF09D-16.png" to the frontend as a static asset (served from the frontend, not the backend) under a stable public path (e.g., frontend/public/assets/...), and update the Founder & Owner block (frontend/src/components/site/FounderOwnerBlock.tsx) to display this new photo for the founder/owner.
